footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Gaming | Update Date: 02/10/2024 | Editor: ._.samantha._.

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Serpent Spine__
Best weapon for Gaming if played with a shield, especially at high refinements.

__Rainslasher__
Great option in Vaporize-based teams. 

__Tidal Shadow__
Free and craftable option with a passive that works great for Gaming.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Redhorn Stonethresher, Beacon of the Reed Sea, Verdict__
CRIT Substats make them stronger than ATK% claymores, but have mostly useless passives.

__Wolf’s Gravestone, Song of Broken Pines, The Unforged__
Statsticks that may have useless substats or passives.

__Mailed Flower, Ultimate Overlord’s Mega Magic Sword__
Event weapons that work in Vaporize/Melt teams and strong as Tidal Shadow if needing higher ER.

__Lithic Blade__
Strong option only if you have multiple Liyue characters and high refinements.

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> ATK% or Energy Recharge or Elemental Mastery|<goblet>Pyro DMG Bonus%|<circlet>  CRIT DMG or CRIT Rate

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Skill: Bestial Ascent
**2)** Elemental Burst: Suanni’s Gilded Dance
**3)** Normal Attack: Stellar Rend

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
**Energy Requirements**
Solo C0-C3: 180-190%
Solo C4+: 145-155%
With Bennett C0-C3: 150-160%
With Bennett C4+: 125- 135%

**Playing with C6 Bennett**
__Normal Attack: Stellar Rend__ is given priority over __Elemental Burst: Suanni’s Gilded Dance__
